user.title: Connect to Homematic IP HCU
user.description: Please enter the IP address or hostname of your Home Control Unit (HCU).

auth.title: Authorize Integration
auth.description:
A new authorization token is required. Please follow these steps on your HCU's web interface (likely at https://{hcu_ip}):

1. Navigate to Developer Mode.
2. Press the Generate activation key button.
3. Enter the temporary key below.
